verses.verse: He that dwells<WH3427> in the secret<WH5643> place of the most High<WH5945> shall stay<WH3885> under the shadow<WH6738> of the Almighty<WH7706>.
I will say<WH559> of the Lord<WH3068>, He is my refuge<WH4268> and my fortress<WH4686>: my God<WH430>; in him will I trust<WH982>.
Surely he shall deliver<WH5337> you from the snare<WH6341> of the fowler<WH3353>, and from the deadly<WH1942> pestilence<WH1698>.
He shall cover<WH5526> you with his feathers<WH84>, and under his wings<WH3671> shall you trust<WH2620>: his truth<WH571> shall be your shield<WH6793> and shield<WH5507>.
You shall not be afraid<WH3372> for the terror<WH6343> by night<WH3915>; nor for the arrow<WH2671> that flies<WH5774> by day<WH3119>;
Nor for the pestilence<WH1698> that walks<WH1980> in darkness<WH652>; nor for the destruction<WH6986> that wastes<WH7736> at noonday<WH6672>.
A thousand<WH505> shall fall<WH5307> at your side<WH6654>, and ten thousand<WH7233> at your right hand<WH3225>; but it shall not come near you<WH5066>.
Only with your eyes<WH5869> shall you behold<WH5027> and see<WH7200> the reward<WH8011> of the wicked<WH7563>.
Because you have made<WH7760> the Lord<WH3068>, which is my refuge<WH4268>, even the most High<WH5945>, your habitation<WH4583>;
There shall no evil<WH7451> happen to<WH579> you<WH5061>, neither shall any plague come near<WH7126> your living<WH168>.
For he shall give his angels<WH4397> charge<WH6680> over you<WH8104>, to keep you in all your ways<WH1870>.
They shall carry you up<WH5375> in their hands<WH3709>, lest you dash<WH5062> your foot<WH7272> against a stone<WH68>.
You shall tread<WH1869> upon the lion<WH7826> and adder<WH6620>: the young lion<WH3715> and the dragon<WH8577> shall you trample under feet<WH7429>.
Because he has set his love<WH2836> upon me<WH6403>, therefore will I deliver him<WH7682>: I will set him on high, because he has known<WH3045> my name<WH8034>.
He shall call<WH7121> upon me<WH6030>, and I will answer him<WH6869>: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver<WH2502> him<WH3513>, and honor him.
With long<WH753> life<WH3117> will I satisfy<WH7646> him<WH7200>, and show him my salvation<WH3444>.
